scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace @kanddo-ui/core && npm run build --workspace @kanddo-ui/react
scripts.publish:all: npm run build:all && npm publish --access public --workspace @kanddo-ui/core && npm publish --access public --workspace @kanddo-ui/react && npm run publish:storybook
scripts.publish:core: npm run build:core && npm publish --access public --workspace @kanddo-ui/core
scripts.publish:react: npm run build:react && npm publish --access public --workspace @kanddo-ui/react
